msbt.message: I have some big news for you!<10_4 /> Remember how I was considering— you know—moving away?Well since then, I got talked out of moving by !I just wanted to let you know what I decided. Hope we can go on seeing lots of each other, .

Remember what we talked about before? You know, about how I was thinking about leaving the island? Well, after that, I had a long talk with about that, and changed my mind! I thought a lot about what each of you said, and I realized that I liked being close to both of you. So now that that's been decided, I'm looking forward to spending more time together, .

Do you have a minute? You know how told you I was considering moving away? Since then, I've talked things out with and decided to stay.I'm sorry for causing such a fuss But I'm also glad we can go on being neighbors, .

So You know how I asked your advice recently, about whether I should move to another island? Things have changed, and I won't be moving after all!I feel a little bad about all this, since you were kind enough to listen and give me advice. Still, I'm glad we can keep on being here for each other, .
